Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket

Hy Everyone I wanna share my experience happened just today morning. Few days back i applied a job at Woolworths. I got their email for chat interview. I was happy at least i got a chance to showcase my skills and experience in interview. I did and passsed the chat interview. And then i got their email for next round that was video interview. On that email they say you are supposed to complete this video interview in next 48hrs. I thought i should do some preparation to secure this place, because i am a student and i am in need of a stable job really badly. I took a day to prepare ( yesterday ) and today i was thinking to start the interview after breakfast. But, I suddenly got an email that â€œThank you for submitting your video interviewâ€ i was surprised. I didnâ€™t even open that link to start the interview and it still got some time to complete within deadline. Then only in next 15 minutes i got their email that â€œ after careful consideration we decided not to moove furtherâ€.I only have one questionâ€¦â€¦.. if you hire people by yourself (I dont know whatâ€™s the exact method isâ€¦â€¦) then why are you posting online. Because I think its all about referencing and all. They only post the jobs to make people sure that the opportunity is open for everyone. But in real, it is not. Why are you wasting peopleâ€™s precious time and even emotions. Why donâ€™t you hire people as you hire normally without posting it online and then making them feel down about themselves about not being hired when there isnâ€™t any problem with their profile and experience actually.Woolworths Woolworths Group Talent Aquisition GLOBAL TALENT AQUISITION Woolworths Supermarkets Woolworths Supermarket
